sections.content:
Question:
What is Application Accelerator Unit (AAU)?
Answer:
This is dedicated arithmetic support hardware that reduces the software load of FOC (magnetic field oriented control) algorithm processing used for BLDC motor control and PI (proportional integral) algorithm processing used for DC/DC converter control.
Suitable Products
RL78/F23, RL78/F24
